publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-1624 Ms Sandra White: Congratulations to Glasgow Gaelic Primary Schoolâ€”That the Parliament congratulates the principal teacher, staff, pupils and parents of Glasgow Gaelic Primary School (GGPS) on the first class report achieved from HM Inspectorate of Education for the school year 2003-04; notes that on indicators of quality the GGPS achieved over two-thirds of indicators in the very good category and none in the unsatisfactory category, and wishes the GGPS continued success in delivering high quality education in its new premises, commencing in the school year 2004-05.
S2M-1624 Congratulations to Glasgow Gaelic Primary School (lodged on 23 August 2004) Pauline McNeill*
S2M-1624 Congratulations to Glasgow Gaelic Primary School (lodged on 23 August 2004) Tommy Sheridan*
